DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate clinical performance PRO-Kinetic ENERGYÂ® coronary bare metal stent system patient population within defined Instructions Use .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Safety Profile PRO-Kinetic ENERGY Coronary Stent System Daily Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Patient sign informed consent data release Patient eligible percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) De novo restenosed coronary artery lesion Patient geographically stable willing participate follow assessment Patient > 18 year age Patient receive one stent , PROKinetic ENERGY stent within vessel Patient know allergy aspirin , clopidogrel , ticlopidine , heparin anticoagulation / antiplatelet therapy require PCI Patient present ISR ( instent restenosis )
